name: Library of Alexandria
description:
History has doomed the library of Alexandria
to fall apart

- but that’s not important right now!

Being a librarian, you know better than anyone
how noisy and messy people can be. 

No matter what - your top priority is to remind
noisy visitors that a library is a
place for SILENCE and peace of mind.

And to answer an important question...
Does anybody actually read in this place..?

(Wait, is that fire..?)



Move around with 

 or

Pick up and leave books with

And most importantly…
Hush the visitors by using


During the fall of 2022, six Yrgo students teamed up to create

the most chaotic library known to man, in no more than seven weeks...

The stakes were high.

Their determination was higher.

Emil Engdahl

Julia Isaksson

Jovin Fast

Rubina Aslam

Alvin Alvrud

Linda Fragrelius

Enjoy!
